Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 94-569.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Flathead and the Lewis and Clark National Forests in Montana as wilderness.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 94-569) Designates a specified area known as the Great Bear Wilderness in the Flathead and Lewis and Clark National Forests in the State of Montana to be studied for its eligibility for inclusion in the National Wilderness Preservation System.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Flathead and the Lewis and Clark National Forests in Montana as wilderness.
